title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs with a single command, includes REST API, CLI, and model library.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API, works in Node & browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, sync & async APIs, streaming support.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, multi-user).

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app that talks to local Ollama server.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, history, syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple RAG pipeline using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama API, Android-compatible.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client library for Ollama, supports streaming and embeddings.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM calls.

title: ollama-nest
summary: NestJS module providing injectable Ollama service with decorators.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir client for Ollama with GenServer-backed connection pooling.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate for Ollama API with async/await and serde types.

title: ollama-go
summary: Go client library for Ollama, supports streaming and embeddings.

title: ollama-php
summary: PHP client for Ollama with Laravel wrapper package.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client for Ollama using std.http.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.
